text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child A
text_block_list.text: Do you mean it? Like... really, really<n>mean it?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child B
text_block_list.text: Haha! You bet! Wanna pinky swear<n>on it?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child A
text_block_list.text: Pinky swear? What's that?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child B
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you don't know? Well, you see...<n>we put our little fingers
together like<n>this...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child B
text_block_list.text:
Then you gotta say, "Cross my heart<n>and hope to die." It's
like a magic<n>spell to make sure we keep our<n>promise! Got
it?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child A
text_block_list.text: A magic spell... I got it! Okay—one, two,<n>three!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Children
text_block_list.text:
Cross my heart and hope to die.<n>Together forever, you and
I!
Several years later...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Come on, Dia! Hurry up!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Slow down, Kita!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
But we'll be tardy if we don't pick up<n>the pace! Seriously,
how can it be this<n>late already?!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Well, of course we're late! You went<n>into Friendly
Neighborhood Kita mode,<n>after all.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
First you helped that old lady with her<n>bags, then there was
that lost kid...<n>And let's not forget how you cheered<n>up
that lonely old man.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I-I mean I couldn't just ignore them!<n>But I guess we'd
better make a run<n>for it...

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Ah—wait, Kita! Look over there!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: What is it?! Is someone in trouble?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
There are stones bouncing all along<n>the river's surface! Do
those boys<n>have psychic powers?!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Oh, honestly... They're just skipping<n>stones! You know, I
think your<n>curiosity might be another thing<n>slowing us
down here...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, no more distractions! Let's<n>keep moving—we've
got people to<n>meet!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
...And now, for the benefit of our new<n>students, allow me to
reiterate the<n>purpose of today's race.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Phew... Looks like we made it just in<n>time! Thank goodness!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Shh! The student council president<n>has already begun her
speech.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
What does it mean to run at Tracen<n>Academy? In order to
discover the<n>answer firsthand, all of you who have<n>yet to
debut are invited to witness a<n>special event—a welcome
race, so to<n>speak.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That said, it is bona fide race featuring<n>a coterie of
exceptionally gifted<n>runners clad in their racewear. I look<n>
forward to hearing your thoughts and<n>impressions
afterward.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Prez! Let us take over from here!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Ah! That voice...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Heh... Well, someone's certainly<n>eager. In that case, come
show<n>everyone exactly how we chase our<n>dreams.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Sorry to keep ya waiting! I'm none<n>other than Tokai
Teio—the strongest<n>racer ever!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Ta-daaa! Like my new racewear? It's<n>like I'm a blazing fire
on the track!<n>Pretty cool, huh? ♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Unbelievable. The president was still<n>talking, you know?
How hungry for<n>attention can you be?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I could ask you the same thing,<n>McQueen. I bet you'd kill for
some<n>spotlight too.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: That new racewear of yours ispretty stylish. Sure ya don't wannaflaunt it a little?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Wha... That's none of your concern!<n>And I have no need to
show<n>off—everyone's eyes will be on me<n>regardless.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that's more like it. But I won't<n>lose to you, McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Ohh... McQueen is so cool... Isn't this<n>great, Kita? Your
beloved Teio is right<n>there in front of you!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: O-oh, yeah... Teio's super cool. In fact,she's almost... too cool...

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Ah, that's the fanfare! Kita, the race is<n>starting!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
(And so, the race begins. The other<n>Umamusume are all fast,
but Teio and<n>McQueen are in a league of their<n>own!)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Our racers are approaching the final<n>stretch as Mejiro
McQueen maintains<n>a sizeable lead! What a show of<n>
power!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
But what's this? Tokai Teio is hot on<n>her heels! Tokai Teio
is closing the<n>distance! She's just two—no, one<n>length
away!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text:
They're neck and neck! Go, Teio!<n>They're neck and neck!
Go,<n>McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Teio and McQueen
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: (At that moment, I feel a gust of<n>wind.)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
(Teio's so cool, and her running's as<n>powerful as always.
But somehow...)

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
(McQueen's so wonderful, and her<n>running's as powerful
as always. But<n>somehow...)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: (This time... I feel more inspired than<n>ever!)

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
So this is how they chase their<n>dreams—in a genuine, all-out
race.<n>What a feeling that must be.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: From this point on, we'll be running<n>just like them...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: At Tracen Academy, the school of our<n>dreams!
Brand New Friends
